answers.answer: An Endocrinologist must first analyze the "burning sensation in feet in night." A Podiatrist (foot doctor), or a Neurologist (nerve doctor) may be called for assistance. See thishttp://www.epodiatry.com/burning-foot.htmConsult with a Nutritionist for weight issues or at least with her family doctor to find out why she is not eating.How is her diabetes control and management? Is her blood glucose levels under control?

question: Can a 72 year old woman very thin have burning sensation in feet in night. With brittle bones. What can she do to solve these issues and gain some weight
title: Diabetes heat/burning in feet
